price: Àti pé dájúdájú àwọn náà kọjá ní ìlú tí A rọ òjò burúkú lé lórí. Ṣé wọn kì í rí i ni? Rárá, ńṣe ni wọn kò retí Àjíǹde.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَتَوۡاْ عَلَى ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُمۡطِرَتۡ مَطَرَ ٱلسَّوۡءِۚ أَفَلَمۡ يَكُونُواْ يَرَوۡنَهَاۚ بَلۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَرۡجُونَ نُشُورٗا

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
